summary: Frontend UI redesign validation completed for 'Emerald Graphite' light theme. All features tested: Login/Register forms, collapsible sidebar, navigation, Dashboard stats/charts, Leads filtering, Connections page, Sales Agent config, Knowledge Base CRUD, mobile responsiveness. All tests passed.
passed_tests: Login page - Light theme with emerald green primary color
Login page - TeleAgent logo and branding visible
Login page - Professional split layout (branding left, form right)
Registration toggle - Shows/hides name and business fields
Password visibility toggle - Works correctly
Login form submission - Navigates to dashboard with toast
Dashboard page - Stats cards (Conversations, Total Leads, Hot Leads, Conversion)
Dashboard page - Leads Trend bar chart with 7-day data
Dashboard page - Pipeline Stages pie chart
Dashboard page - Recent Leads section
Sidebar - Logo in top left corner (TeleAgent with Zap icon)
Sidebar - Collapse button works (w-56 -> w-[68px])
Sidebar - Expand button works (w-[68px] -> w-56)
Sidebar - Collapsed state shows icons only with tooltips
Sidebar - User section with avatar and Sign Out button
Navigation - Dashboard page accessible
Navigation - Leads page accessible with search and filters
Navigation - Connections page accessible (Telegram, Bitrix24, Google Sheets)
Navigation - Sales Agent page accessible with config forms
Navigation - Knowledge Base page accessible with document list
Leads page - Search input visible
Leads page - Hotness filter dropdown works
Leads page - Status filter visible
Connections page - Telegram Bot card with token input
Connections page - Bitrix24 CRM card (Demo Mode)
Connections page - Google Sheets card (Coming Soon)
Sales Agent page - Business Information section
Sales Agent page - Agent Persona section with tone/language
Sales Agent page - Greeting Message section
Knowledge Base page - Add Document button
Knowledge Base page - Document list with delete icons
Knowledge Base page - Add Document modal opens
Knowledge Base page - Document creation works
Toast notifications - Working correctly
Logout functionality - Redirects to login page
Mobile responsiveness - Login page adapts
Mobile responsiveness - Dashboard adapts with 2-column grid
Mobile responsiveness - Hamburger menu opens sidebar overlay
critical_code_review_comments: All data-testid attributes properly implemented for testing
Lucide-react icons used consistently throughout the app
Emerald Graphite theme CSS variables properly defined in index.css
Mobile menu overlay with backdrop blur working correctly
seed_data_creation: Test document 'Test Document from UI' created during Knowledge Base CRUD testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Frontend UI redesign validated with Emerald Graphite light theme. All pages functional: Login, Dashboard, Leads, Connections, Sales Agent, Knowledge Base. Sidebar collapse/expand works. Mobile responsiveness verified. Backend was validated in iteration_4 (19/19 tests passed). Bitrix24 is MOCKED (demo mode). Google Sheets not implemented.

mocked_apis.Bitrix24 CRM: Running in demo mode - leads stored locally only
mocked_apis.Google Sheets: Not implemented - button disabled with 'Coming Soon' label

ui_theme_validation.fonts: Plus Jakarta Sans for headings, Inter for body
